In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Kreideprinz" [[Albedo]] ({{Geo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" [[Fischl]] ({{Electro}}), "Harmless Sweetie" [[Sucrose]] ({{Anemo}}), and "Trial by Fire" [[Bennett]] ({{Pyro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
